name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Venom’s Fury: Attack in the Rain Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash Venom’s fury in the rain with this live wallpaper, featuring sleek design, dynamic visuals, and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimalist Design: Clean interface for an immersive browsing experience.
Clock and Date: Stay on track with an easy-to-read time and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate to your favorite websites effortlessly.
Google Search Bar: Convenient and efficient search functionality.
More Extension: Additional features for an enhanced browsing experience.
